General.Name: Shanghai Labway Clinical Laboratory Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Labway Clinical Laboratory Co., Ltd. sales vitro diagnostic products. It also provides third-party medical inspection and pathological diagnosis services to medical institutions, and other professional technical support. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Shanghai, China.
